channel.title: Stephan Fischer on Hector Roux de Bézieux
channel.description: Recent content in Stephan Fischer on Hector Roux de Bézieux

item.title: Improving replicability in single-cell RNA-Seq cell type discovery with Dune
item.description: Single-cell transcriptome sequencing (scRNA-Seq) has allowed many new types of investigations at unprecedented and unique levels of resolution. Among the primary goals of scRNA-Seq is the classification of cells into potentially novel cell types. Many approaches build on the existing clustering literature to develop tools specific to single-cell applications. However, almost all of these methods rely on heuristics or user-supplied parameters to control the number of clusters identified. This affects both the resolution of the clusters within the original dataset as well as their replicability across datasets.
